1.0.name: wordpress/rawedits
1.0.description:
RawEdits integrates with default WP content editor - enabling you to edit content as is in database. I will be adding more features in the future so please feel free to suggest new ones using support tab.

Features

  • Integrates with native WP content editor.
  • Eliminates any filtering on content you are editing.
  • Integrates with Update, Publish and Save Draft actions.
  • Supports native HTML5 fullscreen editing.
  • Useful with php-exec type pages.
  • Plugin settings page.

Settings

  • Enable it as default editor.
  • Choose to capture keyboard tab or not.
  • Capture tab as tab or as spaces.
  • Allow only admins to raw edit.
